mapper.select: SELECT o.id, p.name AS productName, o.quantity, u.company_name AS companyName, o.is_dispatch, o.is_invoice, oa.status AS approvalStatus FROM Outbound o LEFT JOIN Product p ON o.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN User u ON o.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN OutboundApproval oa ON o.id = oa.outbound_id;

SELECT o.id, o.quantity, o.created_at AS createdAt, o.expected_date AS expectedDate, o.remarks AS remarks, o.updated_at AS updatedAt,
w.id AS warehouseId, s.id AS sectionId, c.id AS cellId, w.name AS warehouseName, st.quantity AS stockQuantity, i.expected_date AS inboundExpectedDate,
o.product_id as productId, p.height AS productHeight, p.width AS productWidth, p.depth AS productDepth, p.name AS productName, p.category_id AS productCategoryId,
o.user_id AS userId, u.business_number AS userBusinessNumber, u.company_name AS companyName, u.email AS userEmail, u.phone AS userPhone
FROM Outbound o LEFT JOIN OutboundApproval oa ON o.id = oa.outbound_id LEFT JOIN Product p ON o.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN User u ON o.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN Cell c ON o.cell_id = c.id LEFT JOIN Section s ON c.section_id = s.id LEFT JOIN Warehouse w ON s.warehouse_id = w.id LEFT JOIN Stock st ON o.id = st.outbound_id LEFT JOIN Inbound i ON o.product_id = i.product_id WHERE o.id = #{id}

SELECT oa.status AS approvalStatus, oa.rejection_reason AS rejectionReason, oa.created_at AS createdAt FROM Outbound o LEFT JOIN OutboundApproval oa ON o.id = oa.outbound_id WHERE o.id = #{id} LIMIT 5
